RADIO STATION WHOM 91.7 MC
UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
WALDO ABBOT. DIRECTOR OF BROADCASTING
ANN ARBOR. MICH.
May 26, 1952
E. G. BURROWS. PROGRAM DIRECTOR
Mr. Frank Schooley, Director
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
I am enclosing my expense account for the
trip to Battle Creek* I do not know
whether it goes to you or to Jim*
If it is inaccurate, please inform me*
I know the sums are correct, but the form
may be wrong.
Cordially yours,
0
Waldo Abbot
Director of Broadcasting
WA:cfo
Enclosure
